comments.en:
This printer comes only with a 3-colour (CMY) cartridge. So if you do not buy an additional black cartridge text printing gets slow and expensive.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

Other drivers as Gimp-Print ("gimp-print"/"stp") or some of the "cdj..." work, too.

Consumables/Refills: HP C6614AN (black), HP 51649A (color), C1816A (photo)
